# Strip-plot design

```{r}
#| child: "status.qmd"
```

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
source("setup.R")
set.seed(1)
```

```{r, comment = ""}
strip <- takeout(menu_strip(t1 = 3, t2 = 4, r = 9))
examine_recipe(strip)
```

```{r autoplot-strip, fig.height = 6, fig.width = 6, eval = FALSE}
autoplot(strip) + facet_wrap(~block, scales = "free")
```
